entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
